column4: i happen to believe that when people become mature enough to realize their self-interests are aligned with the interests of others, some kind of socialist equilibrium emerges.
a whole lot of people through history have believed that, and been emphatically wrong about it :)
that is based on maturity and individual development. it can never be forced on people from outside.
collectivism prevails when conditions are ripe for it. individualism prevails when conditions are ripe for it.
